opotato.epicfight.wrong_forge_version: Warn thrown by Opotato: Your Forge Version is not latest 36.2.39! Epic Fight 16.6.4 + won't work on old Forge Version!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.betterfpsd: Warn thrown by Opotato: Better Fps Render Distance is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Better Fps Render Distance!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.immersive_: Warn thrown by Opotato: Immersive Portals is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Immersive Portals!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.chunkanima: Warn thrown by Opotato: Chunk Animator is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Chunk Animator!
opotato.incompatible.magnesium.rubidium: Warn thrown by Opotato: Magnesium and Rubidium are unofficial ports of Sodium and they are not compatible, pls remove Magnesium!
opotato.mcdoom.without_fix: Warn thrown by Opotato: You installed MC Doom but didn't install MCDoom Hotfixes. Your game will crashed when rendering Dread Knight!
opotato.magnesium: Warn thrown by Opotato: Magnesium detected! SomeoneElseWasTaken has stopped updating it, the compatibility of open-source mods are improved with the update time, if you want to get better rendering optimization, pls try Rubidium!
opotato.optnotfine: Warn thrown by Opotato: Optifine detected! It's closed-source & incompatible with a lot of mods & increase your game launching time a lot, pls use Rubidium & Oculus!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.betterbiom: Warn thrown by Opotato: Better Biome Blend is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Better Biome Blend!
opotato.duplicate.potatocurrent: Warn thrown by Opotato: Opotato contains all the features of PotatoCurrent, pls remove PotatoCurrent!
opotato.duplicate.cataclysmfixer: Warn thrown by Opotato: Opotato contains all the features of Cataclysm Fixer, pls remove Cataclysm Fixer!
opotato.duplicate.mixininheaven: Warn thrown by Opotato: Opotato contains all the features of Mixin In Heaven, pls remove Mixin In Heaven!
opotato.duplicate.blueprintinternetconne: Warn thrown by Opotato: Opotato contains all the features of Blueprint Internet Connection Disabler, pls remove Blueprint Internet Connection Disabler!
opotato.helium.dangerous: Warn thrown by Opotato: Helium has been discontinued and is severely outdated, with poor compatibility. It is not recommended to continue using it. If you are looking for better memory optimization, please try FerriteCore.
